channel.title: Proportion on Amit Rajan
channel.description: Recent content in Proportion on Amit Rajan

item.title: Hypothesis Testing (Part 2)
item.description: ### Tests for a Population Proportion : The hypothesis testing for population proportion can be conducted in a similar manner. Here are some examples to depict it. Example: A supplier of semiconductor wafers claims that of all the wafers he supplies, no more than 10% are defective. A sample of 400 wafers is tested, and 50 of them, or 12.5%, are defective. Can we conclude that the claim is false?
